spiritsExplanation:
The predominant spirit identified is 'Outdoor & Adventure' with a score of 0.7. The description mentions that the run can be done 'outside,' suggesting an engagement with the outdoor environment. This spirit is further supported by the channel's emphasis on fitness and lifestyle, which often includes content about travel and outdoor experiences, aligning with the adventurous aspect of fitness.

The 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit is also relevant, receiving a score of 0.6. The description promises a workout that leaves the body and mind "rejuvenated and refreshed," which is a hallmark of restorative exercises. The beginner-friendly nature of the workout also contributes to this gentler, more soothing energy, aimed at easing new runners into a fitness routine.

'Flow & Rhythm' is considered with a score of 0.5 due to the emphasis on continuous movement during the run. Phrases like 'follow along run' and guided audio suggest a rhythmic flow to the exercise, which may help in maintaining a steady pace and mind-body coordination.

'High-Energy & Intense' was excluded primarily because the run is described as beginner-friendly, lacking the intensity typically associated with highly demanding workouts.
